channel.title: GGUF on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GGUF on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Porting Llama3.java to Micronaut
item.description: This project ports the original single-file llama3.java by Alfonso² Peterssen into a modular Micronaut application, transforming it from a console app to a stream-based, production-ready API. The internals and performance of the original GGUF-format LLM remain unchanged. Updates focus on restructuring the codebase into logical packages and adapting it to Micronaut’s ecosystem, enabling easier integration with Java microservices. This streamlined design retains the original’s simplicity while enhancing scalability and usability for modern AI applications.
